DOC.brief_title: Local Uterine Application Low Molecular Weight Heparin ( LMWH ) Intra-cytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI )
DOC.detailed_description: Following ethical approval committee Egyptian IVF-ET center , pilot prospective randomize control study include 40 patient , study arm ( group A ) inject LMWH intrauterine mock embryo transfer , ovum pickup , control arm ( group B ) inject intrauterine similar volume tissue culture medium ( G.2 plus ref . 10132 , Vitrolife ) also ovum pickup . Admission either group randomization inclusion & exclusion criterion meet start control ovarian stimulation protocol . The standard long gonadotrophin-releasing hormone ( GnRH ) agonist protocol use patient predict normal response base clinical & hormonal profile ; 1 mg leuprolide acetate daily s.c injection ( Lucrin ® ; Abbott , Hoofddorp , The Netherlands ) apply mid luteal phase onward till day human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) injection . Gonadotropins form human menopausal gonadotropin ( HMG ) ( Merional ® , IBSA , Institut Biochimique SA , Lugano , Switzerland ) give intramuscular injection ( IM ) 2nd day menstruation , The start dose range 150 450 IU depend basal follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) level , Antral follicle count ( AFC ) , Patient 's age body mass index ( BMI ) . In protocol , stimulation monitor trans vaginal ultrasonography serial estradiol ( E2 ) measurement start day 7 cycle gonadotropin dose adjust individually accord follicular response . After development least three lead follicles≥18 mm , 10,000 unit HCG ( Choriomon , IBSA , Institut Biochimique SA ) give IM , trans-vaginal ultrasound-guided oocyte retrieval perform 36 hour later . After scheduled oocyte pick , mock embryo transfer do use labotec catheter ( Labotec , Gottingen Germany ) , injection Enaoxaprin sodium ( LMWH ) ( Clexane® Sanofi S.A Paris , France ) give intrauterine group A patient . LMWH safe pregnancy , category B drug , give empirically sometimes luteal phase early 1st trimester without report problem , half life 4 Hours , therefore negative effect develop embryos present time transfer already perform desire effect endometrium . The dose LMWH give calculate comparatively accord work do group Mansour et.al , 2011 , intrauterine administration 500 IU HCG improve implantation pregnancy rate . Given fact attempt , best way compare two different drug biological activity . So investigator want use 500 IU LMWH , know In vitro purify system , enoxaparin sodium high anti Xa activity ( approximately 100 IU/mg ) , get 500 IU LMWH need 5mg . Clexane 20mg pack 0.2ml syringe , And therefore investigator need inject 0.05ml intrauterine use labotec catheter . ( 1/4 OF THE ORIGINAL SYRINGES CONTENT..i.e 5mg ) . The control arm ( group B ) inject intrauterine similar volume tissue culture medium ( G.2 plus ref . 10132 , Vitrolife ) Oocytes fertilized vitro use ICSI three five day embryo transfer do use labotec catheter ( Labotec , Gottingen Germany ) ultrasound guidance . Progesterone pessaries 400 mg twice daily ( Cyclogest 400mg ®Actavis plc . Dublin , Ireland ) give luteal support start day embryo transfer continue 16 day . Pregnancy define occurrence positive β-HCG > 10 IU day 12 embryo transfer second high value 2 day later , follow ultrasonography confirmation cardiac activity 6 week gestation A third party involve actual study moniter progress result record . Study stop 10 consecutive patient fail get pregnant LMWH group . If pregnancy rate > 25 % intervention group end 20 case , recruitment willl continue till 60 patient enrol study arm .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Normal serum prolactin level & thyroid stimulating hormone ( TSH ) 2 . Unexplained infertility 3 . Tubal factor infertility 4 . BMI < 30 kg/m2 1 . Reduced ovarian reserve AFC , Antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) 2 . Presence non disconnect hydrosalpinges 3 . Frozen embryo transfer cycle 4 . Uterine Anomalies 5 . Submucous fibroid polyps 6 . Uterine synechia 7 . Contraindication pregnancy e.g . : Somatic mental disease , contraindication carry pregnancy childbirth , inborn malformation acquire deformation uterus cavity make embryo implantation carry pregnancy impossible , ovarian tumor
